description: [``botocore``] Add Prompt Caching support to Converse and ConverseStream APIs
[``botocore``] With this release you can use a new field to specify the search term match type. Search term match types currently support fuzzy and contains matching.
[``botocore``] Release VPC Route Server, a new feature allowing dynamic routing in VPCs.
[``botocore``] Add support for updating RemoteNetworkConfig for hybrid nodes on EKS UpdateClusterConfig API
[``botocore``] Add support for Marketplace Entitlement Service dual-stack endpoints.
[``botocore``] Enabling Asset Level Capacity Management feature, which allows customers to create a Capacity Task for a single Asset on their active Outpost.
[``botocore``] Amazon S3 adds support for S3 Access Points for directory buckets in AWS Dedicated Local Zones
[``botocore``] Amazon S3 adds support for S3 Access Points for directory buckets in AWS Dedicated Local Zones
[``botocore``] Add dual-stack support to global endpoints.
